step.cmd: Enter an NC number in the search bar. All the defects associated with the NC number appear on the Home Page.

info.note: In NC view, a check-box are enabled against each defect.

step.cmd: Select the defects for which want to create a plan.
Select . Create a Plan or add to an existing Plan window appears.
Select Add to a New Plan button to add the defect to a new plan.
Select any of the listed plans in the window to add the defect to an existing plan.

info.note: You can search for an existing plan using the Search box.

step.cmd: Optional: Repeat step 1 to step 6 with other NC numbers, to add defects from multiple NC numbers to a single plan.
